casebody.data:
ANDERSON
v.
WBNS-TV, INC. 2018-0792 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 29, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for Wednesday, April 24, 2019, of amicus curiae state of Ohio. Motion granted. Amicus curiae granted 5 additional minutes of oral-argument time to be argued after appellant's 15 minutes. Appellees granted an additional 5 minutes of oral-argument time for a total of 20 minutes.
